Detailed Description

Scream base data structure. This structure holds the state information for a scream run.

Field Documentation

The listener address.

uint32_t scream_base_data_s::id

The client ID.

bool scream_base_data_s::is_registered

The screamer has successfully registered.

int scream_base_data_s::num_packets

The number of scream_packet_type::SC_PACKET_FLOOD packets that has been sent.

The communication socket.
